title: National Assembly By-Election (Chilubi Constituency No. 095) (Election date and time of Poll) Order, 2020
content:
3rdJanuary,2020 Statutory Instruments 51
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.2OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (General) Regulations, 2016
The National Assembly By-Election (Chilubi Constituency
No. 095) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2020
WHEREASinpursuanceofArticle72(8)oftheConstitution,the
Speaker of National Assembly has informed the Electoral Cap.1
Commission of Zambia of the vacancy in respect of Chilubi
ConstituencyNo.095 byreason of deathofHonourable Rosaria
C.Fundanga,MemberofParliamentforChilubiConstituency,and
the declarationbySpeaker of NationalAssemblyof the vacancy
oftheParliamenaryseatoftheChilubiConstituency:
NOWTHEREFORE inexercise of the powers contained inArticle
57 (3) of the Constitution andRegulation 15 (1) of the Electoral Cap.1
Process(Gneral)Regulations,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Assembly By- Title
Election(ChilubiConstituencyNo.095)Electiondateand timeof
Poll)Order,2020.
2. A candidate for election as a Member of Parliament for Nomination
ChilubiConstituencyNo.095shalllodgeanominationwith returning forelection
officeronThursday,16thJanuary,2020between0900hoursand
1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 16th Campaign
January,2020at1500hours andclose at1800hoursWednesday, period
12thFebruary,2020.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101Lusaka.PriceK4.00each.
52 Statutory Instruments 3rdJanuary,2020
Electiondate 4. (1) ThepollintheConstituencyreferredtoinparagraph2
andtimesof
shalltakeplaceonThursday,13thFebruary,2020,between0600
Poll
hoursand1800hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a Constituency if only one
candidateisvalidlynominated.
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this
31stdayofDecembert,2019.
JUSTICE E. E.CHULU,
Chairperson
A. C. NHEKAIRO,
Vice-Chairperson
E.J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
LUSAKA
31stDecember,2019
[EC.101/5/2CONF.]
